_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

CatalogueRequest.description: A document used to request a Catalogue.

CatalogueRequest.title: Catalogue Request. Details
CatalogueRequest.description: A document used to request a Catalogue.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Catalogue Request. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Catalogue Request. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Catalogue Request. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Catalogue Request. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Catalogue Request. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

UUID.title: Catalogue Request. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

Name.title: Catalogue Request. Name
Name.description: Text, assigned by the sender, that identifies this document to business users.

IssueDate.title: Catalogue Request. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Catalogue Request. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Catalogue Request. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

Description.title: Catalogue Request. Description. Text
Description.description: Textual description of the document instance.

PricingUpdateRequestIndicator.title: Catalogue Request. Pricing Update Request_ Indicator. Indicator
PricingUpdateRequestIndicator.description: Indicates a request for a pricing update.

ItemUpdateRequestIndicator.title: Catalogue Request. Item Update Request_ Indicator. Indicator
ItemUpdateRequestIndicator.description: Indicates a request for an update of the item specifications.

LineCountNumeric.title: Catalogue Request. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Catalogue Lines in this document.

ValidityPeriod.title: Catalogue Request. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period, assigned by the Catalogue Managing party, during which the information in the Catalogue requested is to be effective. This may be given as start and end dates or a duration.

Signature.title: Catalogue Request. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

ReceiverParty.title: Catalogue Request. Receiver_ Party. Party
ReceiverParty.description: The party receiving the Catalogue Request.

ProviderParty.title: Catalogue Request. Provider_ Party. Party
ProviderParty.description: The party sending the Catalogue Request.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Catalogue Request. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

ContractorCustomerParty.title: Catalogue Request. Contractor_ Customer Party. Customer Party
ContractorCustomerParty.description: The customer party responsible for the contracts with which the Catalogue is associated.

RequestedCatalogueReference.title: Catalogue Request. Requested_ Catalogue Reference. Catalogue Reference
RequestedCatalogueReference.description: A reference to a specific Catalogue; used if the Catalogue Request is for an update.

ReferencedContract.title: Catalogue Request. Referenced_ Contract. Contract
ReferencedContract.description: A contract or framework agreement with which the Catalogue being requested is associated.

TradingTerms.title: Catalogue Request. Trading Terms
TradingTerms.description: The trading terms associated with the requested Catalogue.

DocumentReference.title: Catalogue Request. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to another document associated with this document.

ApplicableTerritoryAddress.title: Catalogue Request. Applicable Territory_ Address. Address
ApplicableTerritoryAddress.description: A reference to a territory (region, country, city, etc.) to which the requested Catalogue will apply, expressed as an Address.

RequestedLanguage.title: Catalogue Request. Requested_ Language. Language
RequestedLanguage.description: The language in which the Catalogue is requested to be provided.

RequestedClassificationScheme.title: Catalogue Request. Requested_ Classification Scheme. Classification Scheme
RequestedClassificationScheme.description: A requested classification scheme for the requested Catalogue.

CatalogueRequestLine.title: Catalogue Request. Catalogue Request Line
CatalogueRequestLine.description: An association to specific Catalogue Lines for the catalogue requested.
